Html:
How can I get my parry rating the same as Armory when I load my char from Bnet?

How can I try to balance my dodge and parry rating in the optimizer?

Which avoidance % (sum of dodge pary or dodge+parry+miss)do you use in the optimizer (avoidance% parameter)

If your parry rating doesn't match what it says on the Armory, then please write up a defect, include your character XML

The optimal setup for your toon may not be from a balanced rating of dodge and parry rating.  This is because Avoidance tends to help itself, and between Runeforging for parry as well as things like DRW, parry will be more valuable at higher levels than dodge.  If you look at the stat value graph from the Options tab, and select just Dodge and Parry, you will see them progress nearly linearly in value. 

For the optimizer avoidance % is Dodge, Parry and Miss.
